amendment.description: To require reports on facilities at Fort Leonard Wood, Missouri.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3080 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3080 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Hawley to Amendment SA 3411. To require reports on facilities at Fort Leonard Wood, Missouri.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3080 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Hawley to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3080 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
